name: Wonder Blast
description:
Wilson's family needs your help on their wonderful adventure! Solve puzzles to unlock new areas, and renovate your marvelous theme park, Wonderville! Blast the cubes of the same color and create powerful boosters to pass the challenging levels.

As you progress through levels, you'll follow the Wilson's family as they navigate through a variety of rides and attractions, each with its own unique obstacles.

So why wait? Join Willie, Betty, Pixie, and Roy on this magical experience and have a blast!

Wonder Blast features:

Blast through fun but challenging levels and unlock new areas!
Create boosters and make powerful combos for huge explosions!
Easy to pick up, but difficult to master!
Plenty of coins to collect and rewards to unlock, there's always something to strive for!
Play with friends or compete against other players from around the world!
No wifi, no ads! Play anytime, anywhere!

If you need a break from the daily routine, Wonder Blast is the best game for anyone who loves puzzles, candy filled theme parks and a good challenge. So come and let the blasting begin!

Download now and get ready for a truly thrilling and entertaining experience!
publishers: Good Job Games Bilisim Yazilim ve Pazarlama AS
